hero.title: Learn Smarter at LKP NAUFAL
hero.subtitle: We offer various courses and training for all ages

features.title: Courses Provided
features.belajar_komputer: Learn basic computer skills, including Office software.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To create individuals who love learning, working, striving, and creating, thus becoming creative, independent, noble in character, and capable of facing global challenges.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To serve the needs for learning guidance and provide the education and skills required by the community based on spiritual values to face global challenges.

goal.title: Goal
goal.description: To organize skill education through courses and training for the community, and to provide tutoring services to help children develop a love for learning.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us for more information

footer.description: Shaping a competent generation through quality training.
